title: NetworkGatewaysProvider (/sdks/wayfinder/wayfinder-core/(gateway-providers)/networkgatewaysprovider)
content: Returns a list of gateways from the ARIO Network based on on-chain metrics. You can specify on-chain metrics for gateways to prioritize the highest quality gateways. This requires installing the `@ar.io/sdk` package and importing the `ARIO` object. *It is recommended to use this provider for most use cases to leverage the AR.IO Network.*
